title: Prohibits reductions in appropriations for the support of education during the state fiscal year
summary: Prohibits reductions in appropriations for the support of education during the state fiscal year.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2170

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. M. MILLER, COLTON, JAFFEE, DenDEKKER, CASTRO --
         Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. CALHOUN,  GIGLIO,  MAYERSOHN,  PHEFFER,
         SALADINO -- read once and referred to the Committee on Education

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  state  finance  law, in relation to prohibiting
         reductions in appropriations for the support of education  during  the
         state fiscal year

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 2 of section 40 of the  state  finance  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph (f) to read as follows:
    3    (F)  NO APPROPRIATION MADE AT A REGULAR SESSION OF THE LEGISLATURE FOR
    4  THE SUPPORT OF EDUCATION IN THIS STATE  SHALL  BE  REDUCED,  LIMITED  OR
    5  OTHERWISE DIMINISHED IN ANY WAY PRIOR TO THE THIRTIETH DAY OF JUNE IMME-
    6  DIATELY FOLLOWING THE STATE FISCAL YEAR FOR WHICH IT IS ENACTED.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02018-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting reductions in appropriations for the support of education during the state fiscal year
